3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in sunny Corona Heights, this Mid-Century home is the perfect starter house for someone who wants to live in one of San Francisco's most desired neighborhoods. The house is currently configured as a one bedroom, one bath home but features a large, cavernous basement which is perfect for expansion and given the R-2 zoning even the possibility of a second unit exists. The home has hardwood floors, gas fireplace, and panoramic South and East views. The garage is for one car, room for extra storage, washer and dryer, large sink and a quarter bathroom with toilet. The home is situated on the crest of the Castro and Cole Valley just one block from the neighborhood convenience stores and just steps from a Muni stop.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This stunning 2-level condo has a modern open living, dining and kitchen space; perfect for entertaining. The chef's kitchen is classic with stainless steel appliances including a 36 Thermador gas range. In addition to the above, the main level has two bedrooms including a primary suite with sumptuous bath and a second bedroom with adjacent 2nd bath. The private garden is accessed from the second rear bedroom and is beautifully planted and very inviting. The lower level has a third bedroom or den and 3rd bath. There are hardwood floors thoughout the home except for the primary suite which has handsome wool carpet. Besides the private yard there is a second patio off the lower level. The unit has space for 2 cars in tandem parking as well as storage + a private laundry area. This is the lower unit in a 2 unit HOA. The prime Corona Heights location provides easy access to the Castro or Cole Valley. Muni Metro, Tech Shuttles and a plethora of shops and restaurants are easily accessed.
Confidential Remarks: Please call for an appointment, home is not on lock box. Do not use showing time. Escrow is open with Gerrie Brindley at Chicago Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 4475 17th Street - a beautiful Corona Heights single-family home with stunning views and an expansive deck on each level. The main level of this home boasts an open concept floor plan with floor-to-ceiling glass doors that open onto an oversized deck with gorgeous water and city views, the epitome of indoor/outdoor living. Take in the views from the bright living room with a charming fireplace and direct deck access. The space flows seamlessly into the dining area and kitchen, creating the perfect environment for entertaining and relaxation. This level is complete with two bedrooms and a bathroom with a large soaking tub. The lower level of this home includes an open, studio layout (3rd Bedroom) with an additional full bathroom, kitchenette, and attached deck with hot tub - the possibilities are endless! Continue down for access to the peaceful, landscaped backyard and additional large bonus room, perfect for a home office or gym. Two additional storage areas and one car garage complete this amazing view home! Situated in an A+ location - an easy walk to Corona Heights Park, Cole Valley, and Castro Street hotspots.
Confidential Remarks: Contact Aaron Bellings for more information (415) 601-3000 or Aaron@BellingsBrothers.com

Remarks: Nestled along one of Corona Heights' most coveted & tranquil tree-lined streets, this charming top floor 2BR/2BA modern view condo in boutique 2-unit bldg. offers the sophistication of contemporary elegance. Bright & spacious open concept living/dining room, flooded w/ natural light, showcases panoramic city & bay views. Living room boasts inviting wood-burning fireplace & view walkout deck. Living space flows into the modern chef's kitchen & provides perfect venue for entertaining. Updated kitchen features a Bertazzoni gas range, brand new quartz countertops & backsplashes, stainless steel appliances & ample cabinetry. Located at rear of the unit, the 2BR overlook serene garden landscape. Spacious primary suite offers en suite bathroom & opens to deck & walkway to beautifully landscaped terrace garden. Freshly painted walls, engineered hardwood floors, new modern light fixtures, recessed lighting, Lutron dimmers and controls & Nest thermostat complete the home. Garage features indep. parking for 1 car w/ ample storage & private laundry. Freshly painted front building exterior & common stairwell. Convenient location within walking distance to vibrant Castro neighborhood restaurants/shops, public transit & tech shuttles. Steps to Randall Museum and the scenic Corona Heights Park.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Attention contractors and buyers with imagination! This diamond in the rough is an excellent opportunity to create a wonderful home in one of San Francisco's most coveted neighborhoods. On the main level, the large living room has a fireplace, coved ceilings and bay windows with unobstructed views of the City to the Bay. Classic pocket doors open from the living room to the large dining room with built-in cabinet. The kitchen and half-bath have been removed and are waiting for a new owner. Stairs descend to a recently remodeled bedroom and bath. This room has a private entrance from the front of the home. The upper level consists of two, nice sized bedrooms. The front bedroom has amazing views and the rear bedroom has direct access to a deck and stairs to a spacious yard. There is also a full bath on this level. There is also a one-car garage. 64 Mars Street is minutes from the Castro, Cole Valley and Haight Ashbury neighborhoods,public transportation and Buena Vista Park.
Confidential Remarks: As-Is sale. Great opportunity. Easy to show. Contact Bill at 415-309-7279.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 20 Graystone Terrace is a stunning 3BR+/2.5BA Craftsman home located on one of the most sought-after blocks in San Francisco. The property boasts breathtaking downtown and east bay views and has undergone substantial upgrades over the years, preserving its classic beauty. As you enter the home, a wide and elegant foyer leads to a sun-filled living room with Bay windows & wood-burning fireplace. The spacious dining rm faces a gorgeous garden and retains its original Craftsman details. The well-appointed kitchen is complete with modern cabinets, white quartz counters, and doors to the garden. There's also a lounge area within the kitchen for family and friends to interact and help prepare meals. A half bath is also on the first floor. Upstairs, the bedrooms are accessed by a staircase that mirrors the elegance of the foyer. The primary bedroom boasts spectacular views and features a spacious en-suite bath with a walk-in closet and French doors leading to the updated balcony/deck. The middle bedroom is spacious and the 3rd bedroom is surrounded by windows overlooking the garden. A separate office adds ultimate function to this level. Large garage with room for parking + storage. It's conveniently located near Cole Valley, Tank Hill, Upper Market, and the Pemberton steps.
Confidential Remarks: Seller intends to sell Off-Market. Easy to show. Contact Shane (415.225.5990) Julie (415.730.6387) Stephen (415.307.9698). Escrow with Gerrie Brindley at Chicago Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 120 Eureka Street, a gem on a quiet block in San Francisco's vibrant Castro neighborhood. This top-floor, 2-level house-like condo is flooded with natural light and has been renovated within the last year. The Victorian facade and period details, including original fireplace, are perfectly paired with modern light fixtures and sleek kitchen with walnut cabinetry and spacious island with counter seating. A dining space, wet bar, pantry and extra storage offer an open floor plan ideal for entertainers. A sun-flooded lounge area opens onto a private deck overlooking a shared backyard. Perfect for those looking for a flexible layout, the main floor has 2 spacious bedrooms plus a nursery or an office. The main level living room could serve as an additional bedroom. Upstairs is a wonderfully comfortable family area, office area and an additional guest room. In-unit laundry, central air conditioning, two-car parking and abundant storage complete this special Eureka Street home.
Confidential Remarks: Property is in contract. HOA dues paid annually; averaged per month for MLS purposes. No closet in front room staged as nursery. Top level permitted only as storage. Main level sq ft: 1,600 per graphic artist. Top level 590 sq ft of legal ceiling height, 900 sq ft total.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy sweeping views of the east and south bay from this contemporary 3BR/2BA condo on a short cul-de-sac adjacent Corona Heights Park near Randall Museum. The open floor plan living and dining room features a corner fireplace and sliding glass doors to the rear, view deck. An adjacent family room solarium includes a breakfast bar for the remodeled kitchen which features custom cabinetry and granite counters. There are two family or guest bedrooms opposite the hall bath, with natural light from the overhear skylights. The primary suite is located in the front, has a side deck and includes outlooks to the park. Amenities include high ceilings, in-unit washer/dryer, good closet and storage spaces, one car parking in the garage. Secured intercom entry. HOA dues $425/month. Conveniently located near Fifteenth Street tennis courts, Buena Vista Park. Close to Cole Valley and Castro recreational and shopping areas. Surrounded by verdant open spaces while located near the geographic center of the city. Urban living at its best!
Confidential Remarks: Property is owner occupied, showings by appointment. Very nice upper level condo of two units. Sweeping view of the bay from the back, park views from the front. Garage parking and extra storage.

Remarks: Magical Ashbury Heights home w breathtaking views & a 1BR apartment. 3 lvls of decks, outlooks from Mt Sutro to the Golden Gate Bridge, a 91 WalkScore - walk to Cole Valley's world class shops and restaurants, GG Park, Lyce Francais, Grattan school + playground, the N MUNI line, and tech shuttles. Inside: light-filled, skylit, open living, dining and KIT spaces are lined w a wall of windows, and punctuated by FAB views. A mid century w/b fireplace warms the great room, and a skylit atrium brings the garden indoors. The KIT offers custom, built-in wood cabinetry, plenty of work and storage space, and stainless appliances, including a new JennAir stove and Bosch dishwasher. KIT opens to a dining space w built in cabinetry and more jaw-dropping views. A door off the living space opens to a porch to take in the views or to walk down to the lower decks and garden. 2 spacious BRs -the skylit primary w a large walk-in closet - a full bath, and a desk/office nook complete the main lvl. Downstairs: a 2 car tandem garage, and a ~675 square foot, b'ful vintage 1BR apt w open LR/DR tiled KIT + views. The lowest lvl offers ~540 sft of bonus space - possible expansion pot'l! 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 457 Roosevelt Way is perched atop San Francisco's coveted Corona Heights neighborhood. This stunning 4 bed + 4.5 bath modern home offers breathtaking views of the city and bay from each level of the 3,295 sqft residence with ample space for comfortable living and entertaining. Step inside and you are greeted by the open and airy floor plan that is flooded in natural light, featuring tall ceilings, expansive windows, and sleek contemporary finishes. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, with top-of-the-line Miele appliances, custom cabinetry, and a spacious center island for hosting friends and family. The living and dining areas flow seamlessly, creating a welcoming space to relax, unwind, and take in the stunning vistas outside with immediate access to the spacious view terrace to soak up the sunshine or watch the twinkling lights of the city at night. The 4 bedrooms are generously sized, each with its own en-suite bathroom including three beds on one level all with ample closet space. The primary suite is a true oasis, with a walk-in closet, spa-like bathroom, and a private balcony to enjoy the panoramic views.
Confidential Remarks: Buyer to verify SQFT, fourth bedroom is legally an office/study. Buyer and buyers agent to carefully review disclosures and all reports/job cards and final permit sign offs. Inspections on file in disclosure package. Buyer to test car in garage.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your new modern VIEW home in Corona Heights! Renovated to-the-studs in 2022, this unique townhouse-style condo offers a layout featuring a flexible 3 bedroom/2 bath floor plan with stunning city views on a quiet tree lined street. The outdoor space is unparalleled, with 2 front decks and a huge picturesque, exclusive-use, private, terraced backyard with plenty of space for entertaining and gardening. The upgrades are endless with no stone left unturned; a spacious and connected living, dining and kitchen layout. The kitchen area has abundant counter space, beautiful designer tile and the appliance package does not disappoint! The primary bathroom features a double vanity, and all bathrooms are equipped with beautiful cabinetry, modern white counters and tile. The primary bedroom offers access to the large patio with built-in wood accents, and a stair way leading up to the terraced garden. Plenty of closet space and a large side-by-side garage complete this package.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Modern and luxurious 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath single family home with mesmerizing downtown and bay views! Rare, newer construction with thoughtful design and expert craftsmanship, and keen attention to functionality and aesthetics. Chef's kitchen is a dream with Ceasarstone countertops, custom backsplash and cabinetry, oversized island with second sink and breakfast bar, built-in Thermador refrigerator with custom door panels, stainless Miele 5-burner cooktop and hood, wall oven and warming oven, steam oven, and built-in coffee maker. Smart, spacious layout is ideal for entertaining with high ceilings and large windows allowing for abundant natural light. 4 spacious bedrooms including a luxe primary with walk-in closet and elegant en-suite bath. Many special additions including bonus office, den, and 700 bottle cellar for every wine aficionado. Luxury amenities include Quarter Sawn white oak floors with radiant heating, custom gas fireplace, 4 decks each with an impeccable view, outdoor kitchen with gas BBQ and grill, and landscaped garden and patio. This home is complete with 2-car garage parking and EV charging, and an in-home elevator. Welcome home - stay awhile and soak in the views of Buena Vista Park, downtown, the bay, Bay Bridge and the East Bay!
Confidential Remarks: claytonmodern.willowmar.com // Offers due Thursday, 2/15 at 11am. Contact Brandea Bunnag at bran@willowmar.com or 310.291.8006 for disclosures, showings, and questions. Escrow opened with Paula Siegel at Fidelity National Title.
Public Remarks: Modern and luxurious 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath single family home with mesmerizing downtown and bay views! Rare, newer construction with thoughtful design and expert craftsmanship, and keen attention to functionality and aesthetics. Chef's kitchen is a dream with Ceasarstone countertops, custom backsplash and cabinetry, oversized island with second sink and breakfast bar, built-in Thermador refrigerator with custom door panels, stainless Miele 5-burner cooktop and hood, wall oven and warming oven, steam oven, and built-in coffee maker. Smart, spacious layout is ideal for entertaining with high ceilings and large windows allowing for abundant natural light. 4 spacious bedrooms including a luxe primary with walk-in closet and elegant en-suite bath. Many special additions including bonus office, den, and 700 bottle cellar for every wine aficionado. Luxury amenities include Quarter Sawn white oak floors with radiant heating, custom gas fireplace, 4 decks each with an impeccable view, outdoor kitchen with gas BBQ and grill, and landscaped garden and patio. This home is complete with 2-car garage parking and EV charging, and an in-home elevator. Welcome home - stay awhile and soak in the views of Buena Vista Park, downtown, the bay, Bay Bridge and the East Bay!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to a top floor, beautifully updated condo on a quaint, tree-lined block. This light-filled, home reflects the style, sophistication + elegance of SF; it's the definition of true pride of ownership. The open floor plan, remodeled kitchen + bath, and 2 spacious BRs are enhanced by the panoramic views of downtown and the surrounding hills which will be your reward as the new owner. Hardwood floors, period detailing, recessed lighting + beautiful large windows allow for sought-after views of the City. Providing great separation of space, the comfortable front bedrooms connect seamlessly to the rear of the home. 1 BR features a decorative fireplace, built-in bookshelves and a bay window. The 2nd BR has a large custom closet. The dreamy kitchen has stainless steel appliances, a built-in wine rack, a separate eating area, and direct access to the sunny, lushly landscaped, shared backyard. The BA is a split bath, promoting privacy. This elegant flat features an additional laundry room in the rear of the unit with a newer w/d, deeded storage, and 1 car garage parking. This 3 unit Edwardian is very well maintained + funded. Here you are merely moments away from the spirited Castro di

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: One of the most sought-after neighborhoods-Eureka Valley! 75 Caselli Ave home has not been on the market for over 50 years! Built 1918. This is an amazing property to create your dream home and or move in ready. Located on an exclusive tree lined street. These types of homes rarely come on the market, so this is a great opportunity for a buyer. Moments from the heart of it all but situated just far enough away to give a wonderful sense of serenity. Walking distance to the Castro and Noe Neighborhoods. Kite Hill Park is around the corner. Beautiful views from both levels of the home. First floor consists of living room, dining room, informal dining area, back patio for outdoor living and large backyard. One car garage that fits a mid-size BMW 3 Series. Second level consists of 4 large bedrooms and one bath. The back bedroom that is currently staged as an office can be the second bathroom with city approvals. Seller is Selling As Is. Seller is expecting a strong offer with no contingencies and a 30-day close. Buyers will need to do their own home and termite inspections. Selling Agents can provide a list of vendors for the inspections. Visit: https://75caselliavenue1801297.f8re.com
Confidential Remarks: Text Listing Agent Mark Anthony Venegas with Desert Sotheby's International Realty at 415.955.7968 for a private showing. Buyers will have to pay and do their own inspections. Seller will not be provided any type of credits. Again, Seller Selling As Is. Seller is expecting a strong offer, no contingencies and a fast closing. Pre escrow has been opened with Mary Ann Bunnell, DOMA Title of California (formerly known as North American Title Company), 689 Portola Drive, San Francisco, CA 94127. Please reach out with any questions relative to title or escrow matters at maryann.bunnell@doma.com Click here for disclosures: https://app.disclosures.io/link/75-Caselli-Avenue-r4z84tav

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into the enchantment & endless possibilities of this charming 1885 Victorian home. A picturesque front yard welcomes you w/ flourishing camellias & a majestic Japanese maple. Enter through an inviting stained glass-accented door ushering you into an arched hallway leading to a double parlor w/ gleaming hardwood floors, soaring ceilings, functional pocket doors, bay windows, & a wood-burning fireplace. Ascend upstairs to skylights & windows offering captivating views. 2 of the 3 bedrooms grant access to a shared deck with vistas of Sutro Tower & southern skyline, while the primary bedroom provides a cozy sitting area & bay window. The bathroom has pristine white tile & a stunning stained glass window. The expansive combo kitchen/dining area awaits your personal touch, offering garden views & sliding door that leads out to sun-drenched, multi-level deck, perfect for al fresco dining & relaxation. The lower level consists of spacious open room, bathroom, closets, & separate entrance, presenting ADU potential. A generously sized storage/work area in the basement further enhances the functionality. Step outside to the backyard oasis, w/ an array of mature flowering plants and trees. Situated on a quaint block close to Castro and Market St. amenities and transportation.
Confidential Remarks: Supra on utility pipe on the left of front door. https://app.disclosures.io/link/193-Corbett-Avenue-16ezx4vo Offer date Wed - 5/29 2:00pm.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Light and bright 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom Eureka Valley home! This appealing home has an ideal layout, with an open living area and bedrooms at the rear of the home. The oversized living room features a wall of windows allowing for natural light to pour in as well as a brick framed fireplace, creating warmth and charm. The kitchen boasts granite counters, stainless steel appliances, tons of counter space and opens to the large dining room with ample space and downtown views in the distance; a perfect space for daily dining as well as entertaining. In the rear of the home are two bedrooms and a full size bathroom with dual vanity and skylight. The primary bedroom has an attached office nook and both bedrooms open directly to the rear deck and backyard with countless areas to enjoy the beautiful foliage. On the lower level is a 1 car garage, laundry area and tons of storage. The location of the home is ideal with immediate access to Castro village, Kite Hill Park and public transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Gorgeous view residence in prime Corona Heights! On a peaceful, bucolic street in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods, this fabulous home is appointed with hardwood floors, a glass staircase, and stylish finishes throughout. On the main level is an expansive living room, showcasing a wall of windows and sweeping views across the city to the East Bay, and a chic powder room with a washer/dryer. The living room flows into an open kitchen, equipped with quartz countertops, a center island, and deluxe appliances. The adjoining dining area is surrounded by built-in cabinets, and adjacent is a sunny family room, where glass French doors open directly to the lush, terraced garden. The top floor houses an incredible primary suite, including a walk-in closet, a luxurious ensuite bathroom, and glass doors to a stunning roof deck with eastern water views. A second bedroom is surrounded by windows overlooking the garden. On the lower level is a large guest suite, featuring a bedroom with a fireplace, water views, a walk-in closet, and a sleek bathroom, plus another bedroom/office and a detached 1-car garage. This beautiful home is located right between Corona Heights Park and Buena Vista Park and is convenient to Cole Valley and Castro dining and shops.
Confidential Remarks: Staged and repriced! No Showing time appointment please. For Showings, please email Nina Hatvany at nina@teamhatvany.com Property Website: https://www.44levant.com/mls/99396936

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome Home to 4508 17th Street #1. With its extremely low HOA dues, this home is a compelling alternative to a single-family home. Located in Ashbury Heights, offering 1918 sq. ft. (per tax records), 3 BR's, 2.5 BA home features postcard views from the living room deck and from bay windows in both the dining room and primary BR suite. Soaring ceilings with a dramatic clerestory illuminate the living room, with a corner fireplace for cooler evenings. A table for 8 easily fits in the lovely dining room. Recent renovations brought granite counters, fine wood cabinetry, and excellent new fixtures and stainless steel appliances to the kitchen. The upstairs laundry room and downstairs storage area, the latter easily reconfigured as an office or home gym are remarkably convenient, as is the garage parking spot with direct access to the building's interior. Throughout the home, impeccable hardwood floors and adjustable recessed lighting enhance the bright and open floorplan. A private patio is located in the backyard. The Castro and Cole Valley neighborhoods, as well as numerous parks and hiking trails, are all within easy walking distance.
Confidential Remarks: Shown by private appointment only. Currently owner occupied so the sellers need advance notice.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your dream retreat - a stunning, single-family home nestled in idyllic gardens. Set back from the pretty, tree-lined street behind a privacy gate, this two-level home celebrates abundant natural light, easy indoor-outdoor living and the perfect blend of tranquility and urban living. Step inside to discover a tastefully remodeled open floor plan that effortlessly merges living, dining and kitchen areas, creating an inviting atmosphere for relaxation and entertainment. Step outside into the sunny, south-facing back garden, home to a soothing water feature, brightly hued flowers and melodious birds. This outdoor oasis invites you to linger over morning coffee, pause for a mid-day meditation break and relax over dinner. Retreat upstairs to your personal haven with two ensuite bedrooms - both with updated baths and garden views. The back bedroom offers a private terrace. The bonus cottage offers unexpected extra space including a third bath, creating an ideal place to work from home or lovely guest quarters. A large storage room handles the extras - bikes, garden tools and more. Stroll a few blocks and enjoy the Castro neighborhood's energy, cafes, restaurants, shops, history, pretty homes and easy public transportation.
Confidential Remarks: This is a special property & easy to show. Seller offering 2.5% commission to buyer office. There are several measurements showing different square footage & Buyers are to investigate to their satisfaction. House is approximately 1360 SQ FT & Cottage is approximately 165 SQ FT. Rear yard structure existed prior to Seller's ownership; Buyer to conduct diligence on use and status of rear yard structure.
Directions to Property: 18th Street @ Clover is 1 block west from Douglass

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience your dream home in the charming Clarendon Heights neighborhood. Wake up to breathtaking views of the City and Bay from rooms on all levels and enjoy the fresh air on multiple decks. Featuring 3BR, 2.5BA, updated kitchen and baths, 2 car garage, plenty of storage, this DETACHED home blends old-world charm with modern comforts such as hardwood floors and a warm fireplace. Located in a peaceful neighborhood near the Pemberton Steps on Villa Terrace, you'll feel safe and secure while enjoying a quiet escape in your own landscaped backyard surrounded by lush greenery. Spread out over three split-levels, this spacious home offers plenty of room to entertain guests or simply unwind with loved ones. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a charming and cozy sanctuary in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in the city.
Confidential Remarks: Offer date Oct 4 by 1pm. Please use latest SFAR contract and include approval letter, signed DP and proof of funds with offer.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Attention those in search of SF charm and garden space or vacant lot opportunities! This Corona Heights 3 bed, 3 bath home is being sold with a vacant & adjacent 1,611 sqft lot. This property boasts sweeping views of San Francisco and is next to both Buena Vista Park and Corona Heights Park. Details of the home have been preserved & revived including refinished original hardwood floors, two original fireplaces, beautiful wooden appliques on windows and doors, crown moulding, and a fresh coat of paint throughout. The property also has updated light fixtures throughout, kitchen has a stainless steel Viking range and hood set and the bedrooms all have sizable closets. This property is located within a quarter mile of the Vulcan, Shiloh, and Corbin Steps, iconic hiking stairways in the area. It's surrounded by parks with views and dog runs such as Mission Dolores and Tank Hill. It is one mile to Golden Gate Park and less than three miles from 101 and 19th Ave. Grocery stores, hospitals, and eateries are all within a two mile radius making it a practical choice. Don't miss this SF gem! Additional APN (2645-040) & lot square footage included in the sale.
Confidential Remarks: 1. Go direct, on Supra. DO NOT exit the basement door leading to the backyard which is the 2nd lot. Please ONLY carefully show the lot from the gated entrance along Roosevelt Way. Gate code is 0000. 2. Disclosures can be access through disclosures.io 3. Please note this listing includes two APN #'s: (2645-024 & 2645-040) 4. Disclaimer: Property on county record shows 1,220 sqft. Floor plan drafter measured 1,544 sqft. Buyer and Buyer's Agent to do their own diligence to perform their own investigation of the official bedroom/bathroom count (permitted and non-permitted) & square footage prior to entering a contract. 5. Offers accepted as they come, we received multiple offers on offer due date, first two buyers got cold feet & backed out. Please submit offers on a SFAR purchase agreement, with 24 hour offer expiration, provide pre-approval letter (if applicable) and proof of funds document. 6. Please contact the listing agent, Joe Polyak, for any questions at joe@homesbyrise.com OR 415-595-2647.
